marge.middleware.publisher.specification

Interface IPublisher

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPublisher, TikitagPublisher

    public interface IPublisher
    This class is an interface to define the methods to add subscriber
    connect and retrieve data of reader and smart card
    The data and events will be collected and are publisher to all subscriber via EventBus
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    btdiem

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEFAULT_PollInterval 
      static int DEFAULT_Threshold 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addListener(IListener listener)
      This method is called when IListener wants to register himself and receive events from IPublisher
      IListener now takes a role as a subscriber
      The IEvent will be notified automatically from IListener to IListener via a EventBus system
      Add a Subscribe to list
      java.util.Queue<IEvent> getEventQueue()
      Return a list of IEvent
      void onEvent(IEvent event)
      This method is called when ReaderMonitor or TagMonitor received an event
      After receiving, the event will be left in a Queue and then publish to IListener
      void publishEvent()
      There is a Timer to execute TimerTask that pop events from a Queue
      and publishes them to all subscribers
      void start()
      Start running service and publishing the received events
      void startService()
      Starting detecting the events coming from tikitag reader and tag reader
      Starting retrieving the configuration and checking the connection between the system and readers/tags

    • Method Detail

      • addListener

        void addListener(IListener listener)
        This method is called when IListener wants to register himself and receive events from IPublisher
        IListener now takes a role as a subscriber
        The IEvent will be notified automatically from IListener to IListener via a EventBus system
        Add a Subscribe to list
        Parameters:
        listener - - IListener

      • onEvent

        void onEvent(IEvent event)
        This method is called when ReaderMonitor or TagMonitor received an event
        After receiving, the event will be left in a Queue and then publish to IListener
        Parameters:
        event - - IEvent

      • publishEvent

        void publishEvent()
        There is a Timer to execute TimerTask that pop events from a Queue
        and publishes them to all subscribers

      • start

        void start()
        Start running service and publishing the received events

      • startService

        void startService()
        Starting detecting the events coming from tikitag reader and tag reader
        Starting retrieving the configuration and checking the connection between the system and readers/tags
